refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If you wish to move a file, use the rename function

note.para: As of PHP 4.3.0, both source and dest may be URLs if the "fopen wrappers" have been enabled. See fopen for more details. If dest is a URL, the copy operation may fail if the wrapper does not support overwriting of existing files.

warning.para: If the destination file already exists, it will be overwritten.

refsect1.para: See also move_uploaded_file, rename, and the section of the manual about handling file uploads.
